mainBody:
Chad, I want to thank you for taking the time to check this out. These are just a few ideas I put together to highlight the kind of work I’ve been focused on and how it might support what you’re doing at Technology by Design.

None of this is meant to be a pitch with pressure... just a tailored glimpse at how I could potentially contribute. If any of these ideas spark something, I’d love to talk more. And if you know of another direction or even someone else who might benefit from this kind of work, I’m genuinely open to any conversation. Appreciate the time and the work you do.

ideas.title: Custom Display Tools for FileMaker
ideas.subtitle: Visual interfaces built on the FileMaker Data API
ideas.body: Technology by Design provides excellent support and consulting, but many of your clients may be missing an opportunity to make their FileMaker data more accessible through user-friendly web interfaces. I've already worked with Scott on a tool called 'TestDrive'. A web application that connects directly to a FileMaker layout using the Data API. Together, we could turn this concept into a customizable framework for your clients. Imagine clean, responsive dashboards that pull live data from FileMaker. Accessible via secure login, styled to match each client’s brand, and deployable without disrupting their core systems. You bring the strategy; I’ll build the interface.

ideas.title: Explainer Videos for Tech Strategy
ideas.subtitle: Visual content for onboarding, internal tools, or client education
ideas.body:
As a former media producer turned developer, I offer a unique mix of storytelling and technical know-how. One area I think could benefit Technology by Design is video. Whether it's onboarding walkthroughs for client-facing tools, animated breakdowns of your consulting process, or internal explainers for new systems. This type of content builds trust, reinforces your thoughtful approach, and helps users better understand the tools you’re putting in place. With years of experience in motion graphics, video editing, and scripting, I can translate complex ideas into clear, engaging visuals tailored to your voice and audience.

Check out my Video Experience as a proof of concept of how interactive video can be engaging: CLICK HERE

ideas.title: Branded Dashboards for Clients
ideas.subtitle: Custom, client-facing portals for project updates, file sharing, and communication
ideas.body: Imagine offering each of your clients a secure, branded dashboard. A single, professional interface where they can view project updates, download shared files, track key milestones, or request support. These lightweight web apps are custom-built to reflect each client’s brand and can evolve with their needs. I’d love to build a starter framework for Technology by Design to roll these out as a value-add for select clients. With your backend support and my frontend experience, we can create something that enhances transparency, boosts engagement, and reinforces the strategic partnership you bring to every relationship.

ideas.title: Revitalize the Blog & Case Studies
ideas.subtitle: Fresh, relevant content to re-engage audiences
ideas.body: Scout’s blog has been quiet since December 2023. Might be a great opportunity to reintroduce consistent articles, client success stories, and service spotlights. Pairing written posts with visuals and short videos could help boost engagement, support digital marketing goals, easy social media posts, and position Scout as a thought leader in IT solutions.

ideas.title: Service Explainer Videos
ideas.subtitle: Clear, approachable video content
ideas.body:
IT topics like cloud migration and cybersecurity can feel abstract for decision‑makers. Clear, concise explainer videos can bridge that gap. Simple to understand, simple to share, and ideal for the site, social, and sales conversations. Here’s a quick proof‑of‑concept I’m iterating on: Interactive Video Experience PLAY.
(Mobile polish coming.)
